src:
Terbukti! 2019 Jadi Tahun Sial Jesse Lingard
05 Nov 2019, 09:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester Unitedtidak meraih hasil yang bagus pada awal musim 2019/20. The Red Devils hanya mengumpulkan 13 poin dari 11 pertandingan dan terpuruk di posisi kesepuluh klasemen Premier League.
Terbaru, Manchester United menelan pil pahit kala bertamu ke markas Bournemouth. Bermain di Dean Court, Sabtu (2/11/2019), The Red Devils takluk dengan skor 0-1 lewat gol Joshua King.
Ini merupakan kekalahan keempat Manchester United sepanjang Premier League 2019-2020. Sebelum takluk dari Bournemouth, Setan Merah mengalami kekalahan dari Crystal Palace, West Ham United, dan Newcastle United.
Seiring dengan penampilan buruk Manchester United, pemain muda mereka, Jesse Lingard juga mengalami nasib serupa. Pemain berusia 26 tahun tersebut belum berkontribusi banyak untuk tim.
Bahkan Lingard harus didepak dari Timnas Inggris pada September 2019 dan belum dipanggil kembali. Periode 2019 seperti tahun yang buruk bagi pemain kelahiran Warrington ini. Dilansir Bola.com, berikut tiga alasan mengapa 2019 menjadi tahun buruk bagi penyerang Manchester United tersebut.
text:
Proven! 2019 Become the Damn Year of Jesse Lingard
05 Nov 2019, 09:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United did not achieve good results at the start of the 2019/20 season. The Red Devils only collected 13 points from 11 matches and slumped in tenth position in the Premier League standings.
The latest, Manchester United swallowed a bitter pill when they visited Bournemouth headquarters. Playing at Dean Court on Saturday (11/02/2019), the Red Devils were defeated by a score of 0-1 through Joshua King's goal.
This is the fourth defeat of Manchester United throughout the Premier League 2019-2020. Before the defeat of Bournemouth, the Red Devils suffered losses to Crystal Palace, West Ham United and Newcastle United.
Along with Manchester United's poor performance, their young player, Jesse Lingard also suffered a similar fate. The 26-year-old has not contributed much to the team.
Even Lingard must be expelled from the British national team in September 2019 and has not been called back. The 2019 period was like a bad year for this Warrington-born player. Reported by Bola.com, here are three reasons why 2019 has been a bad year for the Manchester United striker.
